text:
Tapad | Full-Time, Onsite: NYC or Oslo | $100K - $160K/YR + Bonus

Tapad is known for inventing and introducing the Tapad Device Graph™ to the industry. We are continuing our innovations by building more useful, data-intensive products to empower marketers to do things more intelligently. We process over 30 PB’s of data in any 60 day time frame, and apply AI/ML techniques to process and extract the value for our customers.

Tapad's Open Source tech stack (below) handle:

___________________________________________

Distributed Applications... Scala, Python

Distributed Computing... Google Cloud, BigQuery, Kafka, Zookeeper, Spark

___________________________________________

Here are our open roles in Engineering:
